title: Split Keyboards: The Weird Looking Solution to Shoulder Pain
description: Separating the keyboard halves allows you to open your chest and straighten your wrists. Is it time to switch?
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
Ulnar Deviation

On a normal keyboard, your hands bend outwards at the wrist. This is bad.

Pronation

Your hands are flat. Split keyboards can be 'tented' (tilted) to a more natural handshake position.

Recommendation

Kinesis Freestyle or Dygma Raise are great entry points.
